SELECT ARTICLE_ID , TYPE , F_GET_TAG_NM(ARTICLE_ID) TAG_IDS , USER_ID , F_GET_USER_NM(USER_ID) USER_NM , TITLE , ARTICLE , F_GET_LIKE_CNT(ARTICLE_ID) LIKE_CNT , F_GET_COMMENT_CNT(ARTICLE_ID) COMMENT_CNT , WATCH_CNT , REG_DTM , REG_ID , MOD_DTM , MOD_ID FROM ARTICLE WHERE TYPE = 'POST'
AND F_GET_USER_NM(USER_ID) = #{userNm}
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND ARTICLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{article}, '%')
ORDER BY LIKE_CNT DESC, WATCH_CNT DESC, REG_DTM DESC

SELECT ARTICLE_ID , TYPE , F_GET_TAG_NM(ARTICLE_ID) TAG_IDS , USER_ID , F_GET_USER_NM(USER_ID) USER_NM , TITLE , ARTICLE , F_GET_LIKE_CNT(ARTICLE_ID) LIKE_CNT , F_GET_COMMENT_CNT(ARTICLE_ID) COMMENT_CNT , WATCH_CNT , REG_DTM , REG_ID , MOD_DTM , MOD_ID FROM ARTICLE WHERE ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId}
